REASON: Medtronic sought to pursue strategic growth in diabetes management by merging with MiniMed to achieve complementary product and technology synergies, expand its market presence, and facilitate a concurrent acquisition of Medical Research Group structured as a pooling-of-interests transaction.

To create a combined rich media communications company with end-to-end solutions across multiple network technologies by merging complementary products and technologies, achieve operational efficiencies, and strengthen competitive positioning in a highly competitive broadband and rich media market.
